MediaTrackSettingsDisplaySurface.summary:
The dictionary's
displaySurface property indicates the type of display
surface being captured.

remarks.para:
-Screen Capture API
-Using the screen capture API
-Capabilities, constraints, and settings

-
-

MediaTrackSettingsDisplaySurface.value: The value of displaySurface is a string that comes from the DisplayCaptureSurfaceType enumerated type, and is one of the following:Not all user agents support all of these surface types.
